hadiths.text: A'isha reported that when Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) fell ill, he recited over his body Mu'awwidhatan and blew over him and when his sickness was aggravated I used to recite over him and rub him with his band with the hope that it was more blessed

chapter.eng-name: Reciting Al-Mu'awwidhat As Ruqyah For The Sick, And Blowing Over Them
